experience.description: Salutatorian, NYS Regents with Advanced Designation with Honors

experience.title: Physician Assistant
experience.description: I work in the main emergency department (level II trauma center) evaluating patients of all acuity levels. I am responsible for independently evaluating patients, ordering appropriate diagnostic and laboratory testing, calling for consultation as needed, performing procedures, and determining an appropriate disposition based on medical decision making.

experience.title: Nursing Assistant
experience.description: I worked directly with patients both pre and post operatively in an ambulatory surgery center as well as colonoscopy and endoscopy suite. Here I assisted with intake interviews, obtaining vital signs, patient transfers, and assisting nurses with tasks such as communication, stocking, ordering, etc.

experience.title: Home Health Aide
experience.description: I assisted a local family with the care of their mother within the home. My responsibilities included transferring between bed, chair, and commode, showering, assistance with toileting, medication administration, meal preparation, and housework.

experience.title: Interventional Radiology
experience.description: Placement of arterial, PICC, and central venous lines, mediport, and spinal tap

experience.title: Catherization Lab
experience.description: Coronary and cerebral angiogram with stenting, radiofrequency ablation, transcatheter aortic valve replacement

experience.title: Cardiothoracic Surgery
experience.description: Open coronary artery bypass graft surgeries
